items.sentence: How much time do you spend getting ready for work every day?
I\'m supposed to sing at least one country song every night.
I might be the only one in this group who doesn\'t hate Tom.
I\'ve got something more important on my mind at the moment.
I\'ve gotten used to doing it the way Tom wants me to do it.
What\'s the name of the piece that the orchestra\'s playing?
Play your cards right and Tom might invite you to his party.
Tom put the hot dog on a stick and roasted it over the fire.
Tom came out of the locker room wearing nothing but a towel.
Tom is hoping that everyone will leave, so he can go to bed.
